text: Boris Atanasov Gaganelov (; 7 October 1941 â€“ 5 June 2020) was a Bulgarian football player and later coach. He was born in Petrich, Bulgaria. Gaganelov made 51 appearances for the Bulgaria national football team. He represented Bulgaria at the FIFA World Cups in 1966 and 1970. Gaganelov died on 5 June 2020 in Sofia, Bulgaria at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Bulgarian footballers
title: Boris Gaganelov
